name: Guns Stripping & Assemble - Shooting Simulation
description:
‘Guns Stripping’is a challenge fast-paced reaction game!
In this game,your mission is so esay,assemble, fire, and disassemble your gun in record time!
Perform every task as quickly as possible to unlock others guns.
Beat each level in the lowest time possible.
How fast can you do the challenges?Much fun!
